Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the county of Lewis to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Authorizes the county of Lewis to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes until November 30, 2023.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the county of Lewis to impose an additional one percent of sales and compensating use taxes
